attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THE REASONS BEHIND SELLING OFF THE POST OFFICE ? ALONE ARE NOT ENOUGH TO WARRENT THE SELL OFF ITS PART OF THE BRITISH CULTURE . ONCE SOLD IT WILL BE RUINED LIKE ALL THE OTHER INDUSTRIES THAT WERE SOLD OFF .
IF THERE WERE A REFERENDUNM WE ALL NO THE OUT COME . IS THE GOV TO WEAK TO HAVE ONE ??

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
